com.bigdata.rdf.sparql.ast.optimizers

Class AbstractJoinGroupOptimizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bigdata.rdf.sparql.ast.optimizers.AbstractJoinGroupOptimizer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IASTOptimizer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ASTALPServiceOptimizer, ASTCardinalityOptimizer, ASTFilterNormalizationOptimizer, ASTJoinGroupOrderOptimizer, ASTJoinOrderByTypeOptimizer, ASTPropertyPathOptimizer, ASTRangeCountOptimizer, ASTRangeOptimizer, ASTSearchInSearchOptimizer

    public abstract class AbstractJoinGroupOptimizer
extends Object
implements IASTOptimizer
    This makes it easier to sit down and write an optimizer that operates on a group.

    • Method Detail

      • optimize

        public QueryNodeWithBindingSet optimize(AST2BOpContext context,
                               QueryNodeWithBindingSet input)
        Top-level optimize method. Will locate the relevant top-level GraphPatternGroup nodes (where clause, named subqueries) and delegate to the #optimize(AST2BOpContext, StaticAnalysis, GraphPatternGroup) method.
        Specified by:
        optimize in interface IASTOptimizer
        Parameters:
        context - The evaluation context.
        input - The input to the optimizer, consisting of a queryNode and input binding set.
        Returns:
        An instance of type QueryNodeWithBindingSet.
